Banner.Description: The Business Analyst, who has worked in the IT industry for 3 years, is a motivated and detail-oriented professional with the IT industry and its impact on business operations.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a dedicated and passionate Business Analyst, I commit to the continuous improvement and staying updated on the latest technological advancements helps me identify innovative solutions that drive operational efficiency and enhance business performance. I am highly adaptable and thrive in fast-paced, dynamic environments, where I can utilize my skills to make a tangible impact.

Overall, I am a results-oriented professional who is dedicated to leveraging my expertise to support the strategic goals and objectives of an organization, while also nurturing a collaborative and positive work environment.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Orient Software
Experience.Jobs.Description: bravoSUITE offers a full cycle of smart HR and talent management solutions for business.
Responsibility: Host and facilitate workshop and the Scrum events.
Inspect the market and contribute to the creation of the product master plan.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and document business needs and translate them into functional specifications.

Support the Product Owner to conduct regular meetings with the development teams to review progress, provide clarification on requirements, maintain the product roadmap, and ensure successful delivery.
Work closely with the development team to ensure requirements alignment and successful implementation.

Experience.Jobs.Title: BOSCH
Experience.Jobs.Description: CI-CAT is a GUI desktop application that provides end-users with a handy set of controls that manage domain resources (e-mail, user account, etc ...) by connection to Active Directory Domain Services and Exchange Server.
Responsibility: Implement new features and fix the existing defect.
Take part in analysing requirements and eliciting the needs of stakeholders through open points.
Provide remote technical support to customers via e-mail and Q&A meeting sessions.
Manage and create release details on business documents.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
